labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Both custom emojis are displayed in text (`:NotLikeThis: :whentm:`)
data.expected_result: The custom emoji from the other server will be in text while the custom emoji from the server you sent it will be displayed as an emoji (`:NotLikeThis:` is in text while `:whentm:` is displayed as an emoji)
data.short_description: Using custom emotes/emojis from other servers and in the server you are on in one message will be displayed in text *for non-nitro users*
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in 2 servers where you cannot use the custom emotes anywhere (to put it simply, 2 servers that have custom emotes/emojis) ( Example: Server 1; `:NotLikeThis:` :: Server 2; `:whentm:` ) - In one of the servers (for the example, server 2), use/type an emoji/emote from both servers (make sure to type it out correctly) - Send the message
